meanings.definition: The beliefs or practices of a moron.
meanings.sent1: Moronism can lead to some very silly ideas.
meanings.sent2: His moronism was evident in his refusal to listen to reason.
meanings.sent3: The comedy skit hilariously portrayed the absurdity of moronism.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to moronism was like following a blind guide.
meanings.sent5: The classroom erupted in laughter at the sheer moronism of his answer.

meanings.definition: The state of being a moron.
meanings.sent1: In moments of stress, his moronism would shine through.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't hide her moronism when she forgot her own name.
meanings.sent3: His moronism was on full display during the chaotic meeting.
meanings.sent4: The fog of moronism clouded his judgment in critical situations.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of his moronism were clear to everyone except him.
